DataElement.preferredName: Immunotherapy Medication Administration Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator related to the administration of immunotherapy or immunosuppressants.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the administration of immunosuppressants to a patient on a clinical trial.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Therapy that designed to induce changes of patient's immune status in treatment of disease. The concept encompassing various treatment modalities including active and passive immunization, treatment with immunopotentiators, immunosuppressants and nonspecific systemic immunostimulators and adjuvants, desensitization to any allergens, bone marrow transplantation, thymus implantation.

Concepts.definition: Therapy designed to induce changes in a patient's immune status in order to treat disease.

Property.preferredDefinition: A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease.                           :The act of administration.

Concepts.definition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A category of organic or inorganic substances, elements, and isotopes used in research or for the prevention, diagnosis, and/or treatment of disease states. Includes biologically active substances that are either synthetically manufactured or endogenous substances extracted and processed to be reintroduced into an organism. Chemicals and drugs also include hazardous substances, and naturally occurring or synthetically produced substances required to maintain life.

DataElementConcept.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to NRG for by script Fri Jan 24 11:30:54 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Use of targeted or immunotherapy or antibody dug conjugates within 4 weeks prior to registration or planned use within 4 weeks after completion of SRS/FSRS?
